subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Robert Byron, the first driver to win a Nascar points championship, is among a diverse group to be inducted into the International Motorsports Hall of Fame. The six-person class of 2008 also includes Art Arfons, Bill Jenkins, Frank Kurtis, Everett Owens and Ralph Seagraves.
